abstract: Hotel industry is experimenting with programs that encourage locals to dine, shop or socialize on their premises by hosting running clubs, art exhibits, performances and other events; efforts, which usually include renovations of lobbies and lounges to make them more like neighborhood hangouts, benefits operators with income from locals while offering travelers more in-place activities and lively social atmosphere.

headline.print_headline: Your Local Hotel Is Trying to Impress Guests With a New Amenity: You
headline.main: Your Local Hotel Is Trying to Impress Guests With a New Amenity: You

snippet: Whether with happy hours, art exhibits or musical events, hotels are aiming to become hangouts for in-towners who return home after the fun....
